content:
https://chat.zulip.org/#settings/your-bots
How is the idea to change the tab name to "New bot" instead of "Add a new bot"??

IMO "Add a new bot" is more user-friendly and descriptive. What are your thoughts?
I haven't worked in this area though, but I guess "New Bot" should be nice and it is kind of intuitive that new bot option would be for adding a new bot.
